text: Ayla Erduran (22 August 1934 - 7 January 2025) was a Turkish violinist. She was born in Istanbul, Turkey. She studied with David Oistrakh. She was a violin teacher between 1973 and 1990 in Switzerland. She was honored with State Artist by the Republic of Turkey in 1971. Erduran won the fifth place prize in the Henryk Wieniawski Violin Competition in 1957. Erduran died on 7 January 2025, at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Violinists Category:Musicians from Istanbul Category:Turkish educators
title: Ayla Erduran
